title: Just a taste
body: Here's a taste of phlogs to come... Mmmm, phlogs.
author: Dan

comments.author: nicki
comments.body:
damn those are some sexy phlogs!!

meow!

comments.author: nathan springer
comments.body: there is nothing in this world that i love more than a good phlog'n

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Who knew that three little pictures could be so drool-inducing?

comments.author: Lori
comments.body: OK, is it just me or are there "orbs" in that first picture?  Hmmmmmmmmmmm

comments.author: duanekeys
comments.body: It's even more phlogalicous in person.  We (springfield bloggers meeting) got VIP tours.  Ok, maybe not VIP, but it was neat none-the-less.  Upon opening the doors, you can smell the progress (that mixture of paint, saw dust, sweat, and tears).

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
It's like going to a no-touch strip joint.

Not that I have.

*Cough*

Ahem.

comments.author: erin
comments.body: i cant eat a pistachio without thinking of you dan. damn this blog.

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body: Chairs!  How cool...people can actually sit when they watch a movie...

comments.author: J.R.
comments.body: Sweet and fine like cherry wine.

comments.author: Mark
comments.body:
Excellent! Now it looks like a cinema! V.cool!

M

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
K-rad
i just crapped my pants again!

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body:
Uh, so that was some tease.  Are we gonna get something a little more "satisfying" anytime soon?  If not, I might need to take care of my phlog "needs" on my own.

I know, sexual innuendo is so clich√©.
